connectorUiConfig.title: Cyren Threat Intelligence
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest IP reputation and malware URL indicators from Cyren using the Common Connector Framework (CCF).

sampleQueries.query: Cyren_Indicators_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d) | where risk_d >= 70 | project TimeGenerated, indicator_s, type_s, risk_d, category_s, source_s

dataTypes.name: Cyren_Indicators_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: Cyren_Indicators_CL | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

customs.name: Cyren JWT Tokens
customs.description: JWT tokens stored in Azure Key Vault or provided at deployment time.

instructionSteps.title: Cost Considerations
instructionSteps.description: **Important:** This connector ingests threat intelligence data daily. To manage costs, we recommend: (1) Set up a Budget Alert in Azure Cost Management, (2) Monitor the Cyren_Indicators_CL table size, (3) Consider using Basic Logs tier for this table if historical analysis is not critical.

instructionSteps.title: Provide JWT Tokens
instructionSteps.description: For enhanced security, enable Key Vault integration to store and retrieve the JWT tokens.
